predicate.note: Frames file for 'arch' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 40.3.2, Framenet entry Body movement.

example.name: a collective eyebrow?
example.text: When the Trinity Repertory Theater named Anne Bogart its artistic director last spring, the nation's theatrical cognoscenti arched a collective eyebrow.

example.name: prepositional arg0
example.text: One of the busiest ghostbusters is Robert Baker, a 68-year-old semi-retired University of Kentucky psychology professor whose bushy gray eyebrows arch at the mere mention of a ghost.
example.arg: the mere mention of a ghost
